depSolver.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /******************************************************************************
00002 * File      : depSolver.c                                                     *
00003 * Author    : Carlos Rosales Fernandez (carlos@ihpc.a-star.edu.sg)            *
00004 * Date      : 01-09-2006                                                      *
00005 * Revision  : 1.0                                                             *
00006 *******************************************************************************
00007 * DESCRIPTION                                                                 *
00008 * Main function for Laplace AC 3D multidomain electrical problem. The Gauss   *
00009 * solver requires formation of the full matrix, so the factor 2 memory saving *
00010 * from the use of the symmetry in the matrix can't be used as in the GMRES.   *
00011 ******************************************************************************/
00012 
00013 /******************************************************************************
00014 * COPYRIGHT & LICENSE INFORMATION                                             *
00015 *                                                                             *
00016 * Copyright 2006 Carlos Rosales Fernandez and The Institute of High           *
00017 * Performance Computing (A*STAR)                                              *
00018 *                                                                             *
00019 * This file is part of depSolver.                                             *
00020 *                                                                             *
00021 * depSolver is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify           *
00022 * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by        *
00023 * the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or           *
00024 * (at your option) any later version.                                         *
00025 *                                                                             *
00026 * depSolver is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,                *
00027 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of              *
00028 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the               *
00029 * GNU General Public License for more details.                                *
00030 *                                                                             *
00031 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License           *
00032 * along with depSolver; if not, write to the Free Software                    *
00033 * Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA  02110-1301  USA  *
00034 ******************************************************************************/
00035 
00036 #include "gaussData.h"
00037 #include "depSolver.h"
00038 
00039 int main()
00040 {
00041     FILE *fIn, *fAux;
00042     time_t currentTime;
00043     struct tm *localTime;
00044     double exchanges, t1,t2,t3,t4,t_tot,t1s,t2s,t3s,t4s,t_tots;
00045     double axis[3];
00046     int t1m, t2m, t3m, t4m, t_totm;
00047     unsigned int ANALYSIS, i, j, nBuffer, nInit, preCond, size;
00048     char cFilename[]="input.bem", cBuffer[32], cBCFile[32], cElemFile[32], 
00049           cNodeFile[32], cInternalPointsFile[32], cSection[20], cTmp[32], 
00050           solver[10], cForcePoints[32];
00051     unsigned int *vBCType, *indx;
00052     unsigned int **vInterfaces, **mElems;
00053     double *vProbParam, *vB;
00054     double **vMatParam, **mBC, **mNodes, **Xinner, **mA, **XF, **xCols;
00055 
00056     /* Open and initialize log file */
00057     file_log = fopen("bem.log","a");
00058     fprintf(file_log,"depSolver(): started @ ");
00059     currentTime = time(NULL);
00060     localTime = localtime(&currentTime);
00061     fputs(asctime(localTime),file_log);
00062 
00063     /* Clean and open input file */
00064     comFilter(cFilename);
00065     fIn=fopen(cFilename,"r");
00066 
00067     /* Read node section */
00068     fscanf(fIn,"%s %d %s",cSection,&nNodes,cNodeFile);
00069 
00070     /* Read element section */
00071     fscanf(fIn,"%s %d %s %s",cSection,&nElems,cElemType,cElemFile);
00072     for(i = 0; i < 6; i++) cElemType[i] = tolower(cElemType[i]);
00073 
00074     /* Read materials section */
00075     fscanf(fIn,"%s %d",cSection,&nMats);
00076     vMatParam = doubleMatrix(nMats,2,0);
00077     for(i = 0; i < nMats; i++)
00078         fscanf(fIn,"%d %le %le",&nBuffer,&vMatParam[i][0],&vMatParam[i][1]);
00079 
00080     /* Read interfaces section */
00081     fscanf(fIn,"%s %d",cSection,&nInterfaces);
00082     if(nInterfaces > 0){
00083         vInterfaces = uintMatrix(nInterfaces,2,0);
00084         for(i = 0; i < nInterfaces; i++)
00085             fscanf(fIn,"%d %d %d",&nBuffer,&vInterfaces[i][0],&vInterfaces[i][1]);
00086     }
00087 
00088     /* Read problems section */
00089     fscanf(fIn,"%s",cSection);
00090     size = 2*nNodes;                    /* Characteristic size of the problem */
00091     vProbParam = doubleVector(1,1);     /* This could be a double scalar      */
00092     vBCType = uintVector(size,1);
00093     mBC = doubleMatrix(size,3,1);
00094 
00095     /* Read problem parameters */
00096     fscanf(fIn,"%le",&vProbParam[0]);
00097     fscanf(fIn,"%s",cBCFile);
00098 
00099     /* Clean and read boundary conditions file (bc stored as integer value) */
00100     comFilter(cBCFile);
00101     fAux = fopen(cBCFile,"r");
00102     for(j = 0; j < size; j++){
00103         fscanf(fAux,"%d",&nBuffer);     /* Discard index */
00104         fscanf(fAux,"%s",cBuffer);
00105         if(strncmp(cBuffer,"C",1) == 0 || strncmp(cBuffer,"c",1) == 0){
00106             strncpy(cTmp,&cBuffer[1],strlen(cBuffer)-1);
00107             nBuffer = atoi(cTmp) + 5;
00108         }
00109         else nBuffer = atoi(cBuffer);        
00110         vBCType[j] = nBuffer;
00111 
00112         /* Decide how many values to read depending on bc type */
00113         if((nBuffer > 2) && (nBuffer < 6))
00114             fscanf(fAux,"%le %le %le",&mBC[j][0],&mBC[j][1],&mBC[j][2]);
00115         else if(nBuffer == 0 || nBuffer == 6)
00116             fscanf(fAux,"%le %le",&mBC[j][0],&mBC[j][1]);
00117         else fscanf(fAux,"%le",&mBC[j][0]);
00118     }
00119     fclose(fAux);
00120 
00121     /* Set element properties (nDim, nNodesInElem, nElemType) */
00122     nElemType = elemType();
00123     if(nElemType != 5 && nElemType != 6)
00124         errorHandler("ERROR: Incorrect Element Type");
00125 
00126     /* Read analysis section - default solver if Gauss-Jordan */
00127     fscanf(fIn,"%s %s ",cBuffer,solver);
00128     for(i = 0; i < strlen(solver); i++) solver[i] = toupper(solver[i]);
00129     if(strcmp(solver,"GMRES") == 0) /* Get initialization method for gmres */
00130         fscanf(fIn,"%d %d",&preCond,&nInit);
00131     fscanf(fIn," %d ",&ANALYSIS);
00132     
00133     /* Multipolar approximations for sphere */
00134     if((ANALYSIS > 4) && (ANALYSIS < 10)){
00135         fscanf(fIn,"%d %le %s",&nFPoints,&axis[0],cForcePoints);
00136         fAux = fopen(cForcePoints,"r");
00137         XF = doubleMatrix(nFPoints,3,0);
00138         for(i = 0; i < nFPoints; i++)
00139             fscanf(fAux,"%d %le %le %le",&nBuffer,&XF[i][0],&XF[i][1],&XF[i][2]);
00140         fclose(fAux);
00141     }
00142     
00143     /* Dipolar approximation for ellipsoid */
00144     else if(ANALYSIS == 10 || ANALYSIS == 11){
00145         fscanf(fIn,"%d %le %le %le %s",&nFPoints,&axis[0],&axis[1],&axis[2],cForcePoints);
00146         fAux = fopen(cForcePoints,"r");
00147         XF = doubleMatrix(nFPoints,3,0);
00148         for(i = 0; i < nFPoints; i++)
00149             fscanf(fAux,"%d %le %le %le",&nBuffer,&XF[i][0],&XF[i][1],&XF[i][2]);
00150         fclose(fAux);
00151     }
00152 
00153     /* Read internal points section (points where V and E are evaluated) */
00154     fscanf(fIn,"%s %d",cBuffer,&nInternalPoints);
00155     if(nInternalPoints > 0){
00156         fscanf(fIn,"%s",cInternalPointsFile);
00157         Xinner = doubleMatrix(nInternalPoints,nDim,0);
00158     }
00159 
00160     /* Read columns positions */
00161     fscanf(fIn,"%s %d",cBuffer,&nCols);
00162     if(nCols){
00163         fscanf(fIn,"%d",&nColType);
00164         xCols = doubleMatrix(nCols,3,0);
00165         for(i = 0; i < nCols; i++)
00166             fscanf(fIn,"%le %le %le",&xCols[i][0],&xCols[i][1],&xCols[i][2]);
00167     }
00168     fclose(fIn);    
00169     
00170     /* Memory allocation for element connectivity and nodes cordinates */
00171     mNodes = doubleMatrix(nNodes,nDim,0);
00172     mElems = uintMatrix(nElems,nNodesInElem,0);
00173 
00174     /* Clean and read node file */
00175     comFilter(cNodeFile);
00176     fAux = fopen(cNodeFile,"r");
00177     for(i = 0; i < nNodes; i++){
00178         fscanf(fAux,"%d",&nBuffer);         /* Discard index */
00179         for(j = 0; j < nDim; j++) fscanf(fAux,"%le",&mNodes[i][j]);
00180     }
00181     fclose(fAux);
00182 
00183     /* Clean and read element file */
00184     comFilter(cElemFile);
00185     fAux = fopen(cElemFile,"r");
00186     for(i = 0; i < nElems; i++){
00187         fscanf(fAux,"%d",&nBuffer);         /* Discard index */
00188         for(j = 0; j < nNodesInElem; j++) fscanf(fAux,"%d",&mElems[i][j]);
00189     }
00190     fclose(fAux);
00191 
00192     /* Clean and read internal points file */
00193     if(nInternalPoints > 0){
00194         comFilter(cInternalPointsFile);
00195         fAux = fopen(cInternalPointsFile,"r");
00196         for(i = 0; i < nInternalPoints; i++){
00197             fscanf(fAux,"%d",&nBuffer);        /* Discard index */
00198             for(j = 0; j < nDim; j++) fscanf(fAux,"%le",&Xinner[i][j]);
00199         }
00200         fclose(fAux);
00201     }
00202 
00203     /* Record program status at this stage in file log */
00204     fprintf(file_log,"\nUsing %d Nodes and %d %s ",nNodes,nElems,cElemType);
00205     fprintf(file_log,"Elems to solve AC Electrostatic Problem");
00206     fprintf(file_log,"\nNumber of interfaces: %d\n",nInterfaces);
00207     fprintf(file_log,"Number of different materials: %d\n",nMats);
00208     t1 = (double)clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00209 
00210     /****************************************************************/
00211     /***     INPUT DATA OBTAINED, SOLUTION OF PROBLEM FOLLOWS     ***/
00212     /****************************************************************/
00213 
00214     /* Memory allocation for coefficient matrix and right hand side vector */
00215     if(strcmp(solver,"GMRES") == 0) mA = doubleMatrix(nNodes,size,1);
00216     else mA = doubleMatrix(size,size,1);
00217     vB = doubleVector(size,1); 
00218 
00219     /* Assemble coefficient matrix */
00220     if(nElemType == 5){
00221         fprintf(file_log,"\ndepSolver(): calling formMatrix_tria3() ...");
00222         if(strcmp(solver,"GMRES") == 0)
00223             electricFormA_tria3(mNodes,mElems,vBCType,vInterfaces,vMatParam,vProbParam,mA,mBC,vB);
00224         else
00225             electricFormFullA_tria3(mNodes,mElems,vBCType,vInterfaces,vMatParam,vProbParam,mA,mBC,vB);
00226     }
00227     else{
00228         fprintf(file_log,"\ndepSolver(): calling formMatrix_tria6() ...");
00229         if(strcmp(solver,"GMRES") == 0)
00230             electricFormA_tria6(mNodes,mElems,vBCType,vInterfaces,vMatParam,vProbParam,mA,mBC,vB);
00231         else
00232             electricFormFullA_tria6(mNodes,mElems,vBCType,vInterfaces,vMatParam,vProbParam,mA,mBC,vB);
00233     }
00234     t2 = (double)clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC-t1;
00235 
00236     /* Solve linear system */
00237     if(strcmp(solver,"GMRES") == 0){
00238         fprintf(file_log,"\ndepSolver(): calling solverGMRES() ...");
00239         solverGMRES_el(preCond,nInit,mA,vB);
00240     }
00241     else{
00242         fprintf(file_log,"\ndepSolver(): calling gaussBksb() ...");
00243         gaussBksb(size,mA,vB);
00244     }
00245     t3 = (float)clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC-t2-t1;
00246 
00247     /**************************************************************/
00248     /***      SOLUTION OBTAINED, POST-PROCESSING FOLLOWS        ***/
00249     /**************************************************************/
00250 
00251     /* Potential, electric field and force at required points */
00252     if(nElemType == 5){
00253         fprintf(file_log,"\ndepSolver(): calling postProcess_tria3() ...");
00254         if(nCols > 0){
00255             postProcessCol_tria3(ANALYSIS,axis,XF,Xinner,mNodes,mElems,
00256             vMatParam,vProbParam,vBCType,xCols,vB);
00257         }
00258         else{
00259             postProcess_tria3(ANALYSIS,axis,XF,Xinner,mNodes,mElems,vMatParam,
00260             vProbParam,vBCType,vB);
00261         }
00262     }
00263     else{
00264         fprintf(file_log,"\ndepSolver(): calling postProcess_tria6() ...");
00265         if(nCols > 0){
00266             postProcessCol_tria6(ANALYSIS,axis,XF,Xinner,mNodes,mElems,
00267             vMatParam,vProbParam,vBCType,xCols,vB);
00268         }
00269         else{
00270             postProcess_tria6(ANALYSIS,axis,XF,Xinner,mNodes,mElems,vMatParam,
00271             vProbParam,vBCType,vB);
00272         }
00273     }
00274     
00275     /* Save solution to file */
00276     fAux = fopen("solution.dat","w");
00277     for(i = 0; i < nNodes; i++){
00278         fprintf(fAux,"%le\t%le\t%le\t",mNodes[i][0],mNodes[i][1],mNodes[i][2]);
00279         fprintf(fAux,"%le\t%le\n",vB[i],vB[i + nNodes]);
00280     }
00281     fclose(fAux);
00282     t4 = (double)clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC-t3-t2-t1;
00283 
00284     /*******************************************************************/
00285     /***  POST-PROCESSING FINISHED, ANALYSIS OF PERFORMANCE FOLLOWS  ***/
00286     /*******************************************************************/
00287 
00288     fprintf(file_log,"\n\n*** depSolver(): performance analysis ***");
00289     if(t1 > 60){
00290         t1m = (int)(t1/60.0);
00291         t1s = t1-t1m*60.0;
00292         fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME READING INPUT: \t\t%d m %2.1f s",t1m,t1s);
00293     }
00294     else fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME READING INPUT: \t\t%2.1f seconds",t1);
00295     
00296     if(t2 > 60){
00297         t2m = (int)(t2/60.0);
00298         t2s = t2-t2m*60;
00299         fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME IN ASSEMBLY: \t\t%d m %2.1f s",t2m,t2s);
00300     }
00301     else fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME IN ASSEMBLY: \t\t%2.1f seconds",t2);
00302     
00303     if(t3 > 60){
00304         t3m = (int)(t3/60.0);
00305         t3s = t3-t3m*60.0;
00306         fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME IN SOLVER: \t\t%d m %2.1f s",t3m,t3s);
00307     }
00308     else  fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME IN SOLVER: \t\t%2.1f seconds",t3);
00309     
00310     if(t4 > 60){
00311         t4m = (int)(t4/60.0);
00312         t4s = t4-t4m*60.0;
00313         fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME IN POST-PROCESSING: \t%d m %2.1f s",t4m,t4s);
00314     }
00315     else fprintf(file_log,"\nTIME IN POST-PROCESSING: \t%2.1f seconds",t4);
00316     
00317     t_tot = t1+t2+t3+t4;
00318     if(t_tot > 60){
00319         t_totm = (int)(t_tot/60.0);
00320         t_tots = t_tot-t_totm*60.0;
00321         fprintf(file_log,"\nTOTAL EXECUTION TIME: \t%d m %2.1f s",t_totm,t_tots);
00322     }
00323     else fprintf(file_log,"\nTOTAL EXECUTION TIME: \t\t%2.1f seconds",t_tot);
00324 
00325     /************************************************************************/
00326     /***  PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS FINISHED, CLOSE ALL FILES AND FREE MEMORY  ***/
00327     /************************************************************************/
00328 
00329     free(vB);
00330     free(vBCType);
00331     free(vProbParam);
00332     freeUintMatrix(mElems,nElems);
00333     freeDoubleMatrix(vMatParam,nMats);
00334     freeDoubleMatrix(mBC,size);
00335     freeDoubleMatrix(mNodes,nNodes);
00336 
00337     /* Free only if previously allocated */
00338     if(ANALYSIS > 4) freeDoubleMatrix(XF,nFPoints);
00339     if(nInterfaces) freeUintMatrix(vInterfaces,nInterfaces);
00340     if(nCols) freeDoubleMatrix(xCols,nCols);
00341     if(strcmp(solver,"GMRES") == 0) freeDoubleMatrix(mA,nNodes);
00342     else freeDoubleMatrix(mA,size);
00343 
00344     /* Program has finished */
00345     fprintf(file_log,"\n\ndepSolver(): finshed @ ");
00346     currentTime = time(NULL);
00347     localTime = localtime(&currentTime);
00348     fputs(asctime(localTime),file_log);
00349     fprintf(file_log,"\n\n********************************************");
00350     fprintf(file_log,"************************************\n\n");
00351     fclose(file_log);
00352 
00353     return 0;
00354 }
